data.name: Sweet Office - DLC
data.detailed_description:
The DLC content:

In the character select scene, women can take off their clothes.
In the story scene, you can interact with women.
data.about_the_game:
The DLC content:

In the character select scene, women can take off their clothes.
In the story scene, you can interact with women.
data.short_description: This is a game that combines relationship simulation and whac-a-Mole mode.The story takes place in the office of a company, you will meet three girls with different personalities. Help them solve their problems in work and life and win their favor.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 4160T or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT720 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 4460 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Nude characters will appear in the character select scene and story scene
